name: ChatGPT
shortDescription: AI chatbot by OpenAI for conversation and text generation.
longDescription: ChatGPT is OpenAI’s powerful conversational AI designed to help you think, create, and build faster than ever. Powered by advanced language models, ChatGPT understands and generates natural, human-like responses across writing, coding, analysis, and creative tasks. From brainstorming ideas and crafting high-quality content to solving complex problems and accelerating development, ChatGPT adapts to your workflow and elevates productivity. Available across web, mobile, and API integrations, ChatGPT brings intelligent assistance wherever you work.
features: All-in-one AI for writing, creativity, research, and coding
Advanced natural language understanding with human-like conversations
Powerful reasoning and problem-solving capabilities
Code generation, debugging, and technical assistance
Scalable and secure infrastructure powered by OpenAI
Easy integration via APIs for apps and enterprise workflows

name: Claude AI
shortDescription: AI assistant from Anthropic known for safety and long context.
longDescription: Claude is Anthropic’s next-generation conversational AI built to deliver helpful, trustworthy, and high-quality assistance across everyday and professional tasks. Designed with a strong emphasis on safety and reliability, Claude helps users write better, think more clearly, and solve complex problems with confidence. From content creation and research to coding and strategic analysis, Claude adapts seamlessly to your needs while maintaining clarity, accuracy, and a natural conversational experience. Available via web and API, Claude integrates effortlessly into individual workflows and enterprise applications.
features: Create clear, compelling content faster with intelligent writing support
Enjoy natural, engaging conversations that feel intuitive and human
Tackle complex tasks with confidence using advanced reasoning abilities
Boost productivity with instant help for research, summaries, and insights
Build and refine code efficiently with smart development assistance
Rely on a safety-first AI designed for trust, accuracy, and consistency

name: Google Gemini
shortDescription: Google’s multimodal AI for chat, creation, and reasoning.
longDescription: Google Gemini is Google’s next-generation AI, built to help you create, think, and innovate faster than ever. Powered by cutting-edge multimodal intelligence, Gemini understands and generates text, images, code, audio, and video—delivering smarter, more natural interactions across every task.From brainstorming ideas and crafting content to solving complex problems and building software, Gemini adapts to your workflow and amplifies productivity. Seamlessly integrated with Google’s ecosystem, it brings powerful AI assistance wherever you work.
features: All-in-one AI for writing, creativity, analysis, and coding
Multimodal by design — works across text, images, audio, and video
Advanced reasoning for deeper insights and better decisions
Built for speed and scale with Google-grade performance
Secure, reliable, and trusted Google infrastructure

name: Perplexity AI
shortDescription: AI-powered search engine with real-time citations.
longDescription: Perplexity AI is a powerful AI-driven answer engine designed to deliver fast, accurate, and well-sourced responses to user questions. Built to combine large language models with real-time web search, Perplexity helps users explore topics, conduct research, and verify information with confidence. It emphasizes transparency by citing sources, making it especially useful for learning, decision-making, and professional research. Accessible via web and API, Perplexity AI streamlines knowledge discovery with a clean, intuitive conversational experience.
features: Get instant, accurate answers powered by real-time web search
Explore topics deeply with clear explanations and cited sources
Conduct faster research with concise summaries and follow-up questions
Verify information easily through transparent source attribution
Engage in natural conversations that adapt to your curiosity
Enhance productivity for learning, analysis, and informed decision-making

name: Midjourney
shortDescription: High-quality AI image generator used by professionals.
longDescription: Midjourney is an advanced AI image generation platform that transforms text prompts into high-quality, artistic visuals. Known for its distinctive aesthetic and creative depth, Midjourney empowers designers, artists, and creators to rapidly explore ideas, concepts, and styles. Operating primarily through Discord, it offers an intuitive prompt-based workflow that encourages experimentation and visual storytelling. Midjourney is widely used for concept art, illustrations, branding, and imaginative creative projects.
features: Generate stunning, high-quality images from simple text prompts
Explore unique artistic styles with a strong creative aesthetic
Iterate quickly with variations, upscaling, and prompt refinement
Boost creative workflows for artists, designers, and content creators
Access an active community for inspiration and shared learning
Create concept art, illustrations, and visuals in minutes

name: Leonardo AI
shortDescription: AI platform for images, textures, and concept art.
longDescription: Leonardo AI is a powerful generative AI platform focused on creating high-quality images, textures, and visual assets for creative professionals. Designed with flexibility and control in mind, Leonardo AI enables artists, designers, and game developers to generate consistent, production-ready visuals using customizable models and fine-tuned styles. With tools for image generation, editing, and asset refinement, Leonardo AI supports efficient workflows for concept art, game assets, product visuals, and digital design.
features: Generate high-quality images and visual assets from text prompts
Create consistent styles using custom and fine-tuned models
Edit, upscale, and refine images with built-in AI tools
Ideal for game development, concept art, and digital design workflows
Gain greater creative control with advanced prompt and model settings
Accelerate production of professional, ready-to-use visual assets

name: Runway ML
shortDescription: AI video generation and editing tool.
longDescription: Runway ML is a cutting-edge creative AI platform designed for video, image, and multimedia content creation. Widely used by filmmakers, designers, and content creators, Runway ML enables users to generate, edit, and transform videos and images using advanced generative models. With tools for text-to-video, video editing, background removal, and visual effects, Runway ML empowers creators to produce professional-quality content quickly without requiring deep technical expertise.
features: Generate and edit videos using state-of-the-art generative AI models
Create videos from text prompts with text-to-video capabilities
Remove backgrounds, objects, and enhance footage with AI-powered tools
Accelerate creative workflows for filmmakers, marketers, and designers
Combine AI effects with traditional video editing features
Produce high-quality visual content without complex software setups

name: ElevenLabs
shortDescription: AI tool for realistic voices and voice cloning.
longDescription: ElevenLabs is an advanced AI voice technology platform specializing in high-quality text-to-speech and voice cloning. Known for its natural-sounding, emotionally expressive voices, ElevenLabs enables creators, developers, and businesses to generate realistic speech for audiobooks, videos, games, podcasts, and applications. With multilingual support and precise voice control, ElevenLabs delivers human-like audio while prioritizing ethical use and voice safety.
features: Generate highly realistic, human-like speech from text
Create custom and cloned voices with natural emotion and tone
Support multiple languages and accents with high audio quality
Ideal for audiobooks, videos, podcasts, and game dialogue
Fine-tune voice delivery with pacing, emphasis, and expression controls
Access via web and API for seamless creative and developer workflows

name: Synthesia
shortDescription: AI video creation with avatars and voiceovers.
longDescription: Synthesia is an AI video generation platform that enables users to create professional-quality videos using realistic AI avatars and text-to-speech technology. Designed for business, education, and marketing use cases, Synthesia allows teams to produce training videos, presentations, and product explainers without cameras, actors, or studios. With support for multiple languages and customizable avatars, Synthesia makes video creation fast, scalable, and accessible.
features: Create professional videos from text using realistic AI avatars
Support for multiple languages and accents for global audiences
Produce training, onboarding, and marketing videos at scale
Customize avatars, voices, backgrounds, and branding elements
Eliminate the need for cameras, studios, or video crews
Access an intuitive web-based platform for fast video creation

name: Canva AI
shortDescription: AI design suite with templates, images, and editing tools.
longDescription: Canva AI is an intelligent design assistant built into Canva that helps users create professional-quality designs quickly and easily. By combining generative AI with Canva’s drag-and-drop design platform, Canva AI enables individuals and teams to generate presentations, social media posts, documents, images, and marketing materials from simple text prompts. Designed for accessibility and speed, Canva AI empowers anyone—regardless of design experience—to produce visually compelling content at scale.
features: Generate designs, presentations, and documents from simple text prompts
Create images, text, and layouts using AI-powered design tools
Edit, resize, and adapt designs instantly for multiple platforms
Maintain brand consistency with styles, colors, and templates
Collaborate easily with teams in real time
Produce professional visuals without advanced design skills

name: Jasper AI
shortDescription: AI copywriting and marketing content generator.
longDescription: Jasper AI is a leading AI-powered content creation platform designed to help marketing teams and businesses produce high-quality written content at scale. Built with a focus on brand voice, speed, and performance, Jasper AI supports everything from blog posts and ad copy to emails and social media content. With advanced workflows, collaboration tools, and brand controls, Jasper enables teams to create consistent, on-brand content efficiently across multiple channels.
features: Generate high-quality marketing content quickly using AI
Maintain consistent brand voice with custom brand guidelines
Create blogs, ads, emails, and social content at scale
Collaborate with teams using shared workflows and projects
Improve content performance with built-in optimization tools
Integrate seamlessly into professional marketing workflows

name: Copy.ai
shortDescription: AI tool for generating marketing copy and emails.
longDescription: Copy.ai is an AI-powered writing and go-to-market platform designed to help businesses create high-quality content quickly and consistently. Focused on marketing, sales, and operations use cases, Copy.ai enables teams to generate copy for ads, emails, blogs, product descriptions, and sales outreach while streamlining workflows with automation. With a strong emphasis on speed, scalability, and revenue impact, Copy.ai helps teams move faster from idea to execution.
features: Generate marketing and sales copy in seconds using AI
Create content for ads, emails, blogs, and product descriptions
Automate go-to-market workflows with AI-powered tools
Maintain consistency across teams and communication channels
Support sales outreach, lead generation, and content scaling
Access an intuitive platform built for business productivity

name: Grammarly
shortDescription: AI-powered grammar checker and writing assistant.
longDescription: Grammarly is an AI-powered writing assistant designed to help users communicate clearly, correctly, and confidently. It goes beyond basic grammar and spell checking by offering real-time suggestions for clarity, tone, engagement, and correctness across emails, documents, messages, and professional writing. Used by individuals, teams, and enterprises, Grammarly integrates seamlessly into browsers, desktop apps, and workflows to improve writing quality and consistency.
features: Fix grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors in real time
Improve clarity, tone, and readability with intelligent suggestions
Adapt writing style for professional, casual, or persuasive contexts
Enhance emails, documents, and messages across platforms
Detect plagiarism and suggest proper citations (premium)
Integrate with browsers, desktop apps, and popular tools

name: Notion AI
longDescription: Notion AI is an AI-powered productivity and writing assistant built directly into the Notion workspace to help users create, edit, organize, and understand content more effectively. Beyond basic grammar and spelling corrections, Notion AI leverages context from your Notion pages, databases, and documents to generate content, summarize notes, extract action items, brainstorm ideas, translate text, and automate workflows. Designed for individuals and teams, it integrates seamlessly within Notion’s interface to boost productivity, streamline writing, and make information easier to work with across projects, documentation, and collaboration.
features: Generate content and first drafts for notes, emails, blogs, and more with simple prompts
Improve writing with grammar corrections, tone adjustments, and clarity suggestions
Summarize long documents, meeting notes, or research into concise key points
Extract action items, insights, or tasks from text automatically
Translate content between multiple languages while retaining context
Brainstorm ideas, outlines, and creative concepts directly within your workspace
Understand document context to provide relevant responses and database-aware content
Works natively within Notion—no switching between tools or copying text

name: Tome
shortDescription: AI storytelling and presentation creation tool.
longDescription: Tome is an AI-powered storytelling and presentation assistant designed to help users quickly create compelling, visually rich narratives. It enables individuals and teams to generate structured presentations, documents, and stories from simple prompts, combining text, visuals, and layout automatically. By leveraging AI for content generation, design, and organization, Tome reduces the time and effort needed to communicate ideas clearly and persuasively, making it ideal for pitches, product stories, proposals, and knowledge sharing.
features: Generate complete presentations and narratives from simple text prompts
Automatically structure content into clear, logical story flows
Create visually engaging layouts without manual design work
Refine and rewrite content for clarity, tone, and impact
Embed multimedia elements such as images, videos, and live content
Collaborate and iterate on presentations in real time
Export or share presentations easily with teams and stakeholders

name: Figma AI
shortDescription: AI assistant integrated into Figma for design workflows.
longDescription: Figma AI is an AI-powered design assistant integrated into Figma, helping designers, teams, and product creators streamline the creation, iteration, and refinement of user interfaces and visual assets. It leverages AI to generate design elements, suggest layouts, automate repetitive tasks, and enhance creativity, all while maintaining consistency with your design system. Figma AI empowers teams to work faster, explore design ideas effortlessly, and focus on high-impact creative decisions across web, mobile, and product design workflows.
features: Generate UI components, icons, and illustrations from text prompts
Suggest layout improvements and responsive design adjustments
Automate repetitive design tasks and streamline workflows
Refine existing designs with AI-based enhancement suggestions
Collaborate in real-time with teams while AI assists contextually
Maintain design consistency with smart style and component recommendations
Integrate AI-powered content generation directly within Figma files
